revised_title: An Investigation of the Pelvic Plexus Composition and Variations in Acanthias vulgaris
tldr: The study examines the composition and variations of the pelvic plexus in Acanthias vulgaris, focusing on the number of nerves, the position of nerve canals, and the differences between male and female specimens. The findings contribute to the understanding of limb origin and development in this species.
